name: CIImageProcessorOutput
desc: A container for writing image data and information produced by a custom image processor.

items.name: var baseAddress: UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: A pointer to CPU memory at which to write output pixel data.

items.name: var metalTexture: MTLTexture?
items.desc: A Metal texture to which you can write output pixel data.

items.name: var pixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer?
items.desc: A CoreVideo pixel buffer to which you can write output pixel data.

items.name: var surface: IOSurfaceRef
items.desc: An IOSurface object to which you can write output pixel data.

items.name: var region: CGRect
items.desc: The rectangular region of the output image that your processor must provide.

items.name: var metalCommandBuffer: MTLCommandBuffer?
items.desc: A command buffer to use for image processing using Metal.

items.name: var bytesPerRow: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes per row of pixels for the output image.

items.name: var format: CIFormat
items.desc: The per-pixel data format expected of the output image.
